name: Radio
description: A single selection control for choosing one option from a group

name.description: Name attribute for grouping radios together

value.description: Value of the radio when submitted in a form

size.description: The size of the radio button

onChange.description: Called when the radio state changes

examples.name: Basic
With RadioGroup
examples.code:
<RadioGroup value={value} onChange={setValue}>
  <RadioGroup.Item value="a">
    <RadioGroup.Indicator />
    Option A
  </RadioGroup.Item>
  <RadioGroup.Item value="b">
    <RadioGroup.Indicator />
    Option B
  </RadioGroup.Item>
</RadioGroup>

accessibility.focusManagement: Standard focus, arrow keys navigate within group
accessibility.screenReader: Announces radio button state and group context
